titleStmt.title: A congratulatory poem, to the high and mighty Czar of Muscovy, on his arrival in England on Tuesday the 11th. of this instant January, 1697/8.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by J. Bradford in Little Britain,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Welcome, great monarch, to our happy shore".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
